Description: Green glazed composition shabti with a lappet-wig(damaged), a modelled face with a plaited beard and parallel hands in relief(one broken away) holding an incised adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the front of the leg section is inscribed with two columns of incised Hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar; the lower leg section has broken away.
Curator's comments: Petrie, Nebesheh and Defenneh (Tanis II), 36, Pl. xii (No. 23) See also 1887,0101.292
Condition: incomplete - lower leg section missing, damage to head
